:::{#about style="text-align: center"}
Applied Economist & Data Scientist. I work as an Economics Consultant at [Compass Lexecon](https://www.compasslexecon.com/), where I conduct econometric analyses in competition economics and regulatory matters. My work sits at the intersection of causal inference, machine learning, and applied economics. I hold an MSc in Econometrics from Tilburg University and an MSc in Applied Economics from PUC Chile.
